A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've read a lot of reviews comparing the plot holes and acting in this movie to the prequels and I agree.  Rose is the new Jar Jar and there is some really bad acting.  \n\nI just want to add that I thought Superman Lea was as cringe worthy a scene as when Vader yells \"Nooo\" at the end of Revenge of the Sith.
